acceptOwnership().details: The new owner accepts the ownership transfer.

returns._0: Whether the resolver supports ETH transfers.

params.values: Explicit ETH amounts which were sent with each attestation.

returns._0: Whether all the attestations are valid.

params.attestations: The existing attestations to be revoked.
params.values: Explicit ETH amounts which were sent with each revocation.

returns._0: Whether the attestations can be revoked.

owner().details: Returns the address of the current owner.

paused().details: Returns true if the contract is paused, and false otherwise.

pendingOwner().details: Returns the address of the pending owner.

renounceOwnership().details: Leaves the contract without owner. It will not be possible to call `onlyOwner` functions. Can only be called by the current owner. NOTE: Renouncing ownership will leave the contract without an owner, thereby disabling any functionality that is only available to the owner.

params.attestation: The existing attestation to be revoked.

returns._0: Whether the attestation can be revoked.

transferOwnership(address).details: Starts the ownership transfer of the contract to a new account. Replaces the pending transfer if there is one. Can only be called by the current owner. Setting `newOwner` to the zero address is allowed; this can be used to cancel an initiated ownership transfer.

returns._0: Semver contract version as a string.

MAX_FEE().notice: Maximum allowed signing fee ($100 USDC) to prevent owner error

MAX_REGISTRIES().notice: Maximum number of trusted registries to bound gas costs

attest((bytes32,bytes32,uint64,uint64,ui.notice: Processes an attestation and verifies whether it's valid.

hasSigned(address).notice: Track which addresses have already signed (one signature per address)

isPayable().notice: Checks if the resolver can be sent ETH.

isRegisteredAgent(address).notice: Check if an address is a registered agent in any trusted registry

multiAttest((bytes32,bytes32,uint64,uint.notice: Processes multiple attestations and verifies whether they are valid.

multiRevoke((bytes32,bytes32,uint64,uint.notice: Processes revocation of multiple attestation and verifies they can be revoked.

registryCount().notice: Get the number of trusted registries

revoke((bytes32,bytes32,uint64,uint64,ui.notice: Processes an attestation revocation and verifies if it can be revoked.

setSigningFee(uint256).notice: Update signing fee (capped at MAX_FEE to prevent owner error)

signingFee().notice: Signing fee in USDC smallest unit (default: 1_000_000 = $1)

trustedRegistries(uint256).notice: Trusted ERC-8004 registries (agents here sign free)

version().notice: Returns the full semver contract version.
